Test Case:
Verify that a 2-character Latin name is accepted 
in the "First Name" field
Precondition:
- The user clicks the Order button to navigate to the 
  About Customer screen
- Fields is visible and empty
Test Steps:
- Enter "Jo" into the First Name field
- Remove focus (e.g., click outside the field)
Expected Result:
- No error message appears
- Field is not highlighted in red
Actual Result in Chrome 1280x720:
- No error message appears
- Field is not highlighted in red
Actual Result in Opera 1280x720:
- No error message appears
- Field is not highlighted in red"
